Text:
Thanks so much for this!

The version at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6963708/Shameless.UK.S09E03.HDTV.XviD-RiVER was broken for me, so I can't wait to watch this version, especially now that there are subtitles for this version at www.addic7ed.com/serie/Shameless/9/3/Series_9,_Episode_3 .
